Description.Text: Other amenities/services: Each suite contains a satellite television, telephone, Internet connection, mini bar, shower and hair dryer. The fireplace is always fully-stocked with fragrant wood while each suite is equipped with a sweet surprise and bathrobe. Winter opening times: Pule Estate: Wednesday through Saturday from 12 till 21, Sunday and public holidays 11 til 18. Spa: Wednesday to Saturday 13 till 21. Sunday and public holidays 12 till 18. Summer opening times: Pule Estate: Wednesday through Saturday from 12 till 22. Sundays and public holidays from 11 till 20. Spa: Wednesday to Saturday 13 till 21, Sundays and public holidays 12 till 20.
Important place or monument close to the hotel: The first elite countryside luxury apartment complex is located only one hour away from Ljubljana and Zagreb. Novo mesto - 27 km, Ljubljana - 65 km.
